И так наиграв в эту игру 100 с лишним часов. Я понял что у этой игры есть 3 плюса и 3 минуса:
+Плюсы:
1.Всё зависит от командной игры, в соло ты ну никак не вытащишь. В каждой игре есть своя роль например: кто-то мансит ,
2 человека чинят, а кто-то "Альтруист"
2.Можно убивать своих друзей
3.Есть культовые маньяки

-Минусы:
1.Не страшно, первых 20 часов будет страшно и ты будешь боятся всего что только видишь, а потом будешь чувствовать себя как рыба в воде
2.Нет баланса, тебя закидывает с рандомами например: играя за мана (12 ранг) мне попадались люди на 5 рангах
3.Нерф сурвов
Игра топ

This game is dying and sadly that's a good thing. The MMR system is simply terrible but the devs don't care. The player number is falling and cosmetic items and more characters are more important than the harmony of the game itself. The devs' compare the game to hockey. One word that sums up the game pretty well: Cyberbullying. The DBD community is the worst and most toxic one I know.

3/10
Border line trash game.
Buy only in a discount WITH friends. You won't play more than 50 to 100 hours in this game unless your life's passion is raging, screaming, harming yourself, harming others or just straight up cutting your wrists and hoping to god that he takes your soul to deepest pit of hell after how much you've sinned on your next hours after the 200H mark.
Poorly optimized and will run like garbage even in good enough PCs, despite the fact this review will be outdated by then bcs it will run even worse. (We don't even talk about consoles bcs those already had a month where you couldn't play the game quite literally, just search up consoles after Resident Evil Chapter release).
Community is a mixed bag, you either get really friendly guys or people who are just mad at life and are punching or bullying others for a living.
Game's unbalanced to shit and it only gets worse bcs the devs don't play it and change stuff without checking what the community has to say about it, blocking and banning people who have opnions different from their on the forums.
If you wanna play killer at high MMR or rank or whatever they decide to do, you get bullied like hell due to connection issues or just bad design by the devs, from perk balancing to the fact the prefer they're beloved survivors.
If you play survivor you will get bored because the game will always be the same thing over and over again. Either a game where you do all 5 gens in 5 minutes and go to the lobby to wait 5 minutes or die on the first 3 minutes because your teammates suck.

Conclusion: Buy only if you have friends to play, that is if you wanna be survivor. If you wanna play killer just think that you will get bullied fast after a few matches of early low mmr/rank.

Sure, you can be a decent human being and play any other killer, or be a degenerate and play nurse in red ranks..

Be prepared for bullshitry.

I like this game!

Very fun, always new content via dlc's. There are many matchups like what perks to take? What killer will it be? It involves a good amount of strategy and thinking. You can play it by hiding or being the distraction, the game has a lot of variety.
I would recommend it to anyone looking for a game that involves some thinking.

Dead by Daylight  ist wirklich ein nervenaufreibend vor allem wenn der Killer plötzlich hinter dir ist. Für Leute dir ein schwaches Herz haben ist das Spiel wohl nichts ^^. Mit Freunden ist das Spiel noch besser  ^^. 
Also ich Empfehle Dead by Daylight es Macht richtig Spaß, also ich kann bei der ein oder anderen Situation ein Schrei nicht unterdrücken  XD.

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game where the 4 power roles (the survivors), team up to defeat the lesser role (the killer). Play as survivor and team up with three of your friends using communication equipment. Equip yourselves with state of the art flashlights and instant regeneration medkits to take the fight to the killer. Blind the killer every chance you get and loop the endless amount of pallets at your disposal this is your game you are the power role not the killer, he's on your playing field now. The off chance you may get injured by the killer don't forget to use your state of the art instant regeneration medkits provided by yours truly Behaviour Digital Inc. Once you have finished your objective by giving the killer depression please evacuate the match at one of the nearest exits games. On your way out don't forget to be toxic by teabagging and typing GGEZ in post match chat. Regroup back at the campfire, crack open a couple of cold ones with Mathieu Cote and talk with him about how over powered killers are.

10/10 the most balanced game i have ever played.

Самая тупая игра,  за маньяка  никогда не поиграешь, потому что  игра просто не ищет тебе  людей, за выжившего не интересно играть.Потому что ты только начинаешь игру , только подходишь к первому генератору, и тебя сразу же находит маньяк.
Сам маньяк быстрее тебя, никакие тайминги  тебя не спасут когда ты будешь перелазить через окно, он все ровно тебя ударить,  на счет пинга я промолчу , просто тебя бьют за 3 метра и это норма,  способности у не которых слишком имбовые, инвиз , рывок и т.д
игра не стоит таких денег
от игры надо получать удовольствие, а не  психи и сломанную клаву.
